    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public InstanceBuilder newInstance(String type)
        Description copied from interface: DeclarationBuilderService
        Declares a new anonymous instance of a given type. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking newInstance(type, null).
        Specified by:
        newInstance in interface DeclarationBuilderService
        Parameters:
        type - name of the component to be instantiated (cannot be null).
        Returns:
        a handle usable to publish / retract the declaration.
        See Also:
        InstanceDeclaration

      • newInstance

        public InstanceBuilder newInstance(String type,
                          String name)
        Description copied from interface: DeclarationBuilderService
        Declares a new instance of a given type. Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking newInstance(type, name, null).
        Specified by:
        newInstance in interface DeclarationBuilderService
        Parameters:
        type - name of the component to be instantiated.
        name - name of the new instance (can be null)
        Returns:
        a handle usable to publish / retract the declaration.
        See Also:
        InstanceDeclaration

      • newInstance

        public InstanceBuilder newInstance(String type,
                          String name,
                          String version)
        Description copied from interface: DeclarationBuilderService
        Declares a new instance of a given type.
        Specified by:
        newInstance in interface DeclarationBuilderService
        Parameters:
        type - name of the component to be instantiated.
        name - name of the new instance (can be null)
        version - version of the expected type (can be null)
        Returns:
        a handle usable to publish / retract the declaration.
        See Also:
        InstanceDeclaration

      • newExtension

        public DeclarationHandle newExtension(String name,
                             FactoryBuilder builder)
        Description copied from interface: DeclarationBuilderService
        Declares a new extension (supports new types like component, composite, handler).
        Specified by:
        newExtension in interface DeclarationBuilderService
        Parameters:
        name - name of the type to support (no namespace to be provided)
        builder - associated factory builder
        Returns:
        a handle usable to publish / retract the declaration.
        See Also:
        IPojoFactory, ExtensionDeclaration

        public DeclarationHandle newType(Element description)
        Description copied from interface: DeclarationBuilderService
        Declares a new type using the given element description.
        Specified by:
        newType in interface DeclarationBuilderService
        Parameters:
        description - description of the component type
        Returns:
        a handle usable to publish / retract the declaration.
        See Also:
        TypeDeclaration
